channel.description: Recent content in microcorruption on blog@localhost

item.title: Microcorruption Pt.1
item.description: Intro Welcome to the first part of my Microcorruption series. In this series I will document my experience with the Microcorruption CTF from Square and NCC Security US. My experience mostly lies within application security, but I have been increasingly more and more interested with reverse engineering. Keeping this in mind, my writeups will not feature the most intricate of solutions but will instead show the complete thought process of someone who is new to reversing.
